member.name: M:Printer.Printer.GetField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this function get the field data from variable area in the label print file. the prefix is the flag before varialbe the suffix is the flag behide variable
member.param: prefix string before variable, cannot be null
suffix string behide variable, can be null

member.name: M:Printer.Printer.LoadFormatFile(System.String)
member.summary: Load format file to the printer internal memory.

member.name: M:Printer.Printer.LoadPrintFile(System.String)

member.name: M:Printer.Printer.SetField(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this function set the field data to variable area in the label print file. the prefix is the flag before variable the suffix is the flag after variable
member.param: prefix string before variable, cannot be null
suffix string after variable, can be null
the field data string to be sent

member.name: M:Printer.Printer.PrintLabel(System.String)
member.summary: call this function will print label out. this function will automatic replace some specific field with defined data. for example: <Date:yyyyMMdd> stands for 20100426, (if taday is april 26th in 2010year) <Time:HHmm> stands for 10:08.

member.name: M:Printer.Printer.PrintLastLabel
member.summary: call this function will print the last label out.

member.name: T:Printer.Printer
member.summary: The Library for handle label printer functions. Now only serial port communication is supported. The print files should include label format file and print content file.
